{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=EchoLife HG552a |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/15/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |fcc_id=QISHG552A |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640DBTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=looks like it |serial=yes,, internal,, 5-pin header |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2417;AR2417-AL1A, B84284C, 0911, KOREA; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Home Gateway}}
